text:
For example, md5 file for apache-tomcat-6.0.14.zip (see the URL) contains the
following text:
43c87fe61a3f10d8d4509afea25c8e30${md5sum.binary-prefix}apache-tomcat-6.0.14.zip

In md5 files for TC 5.5 the "${md5sum.binary-prefix}" property is expanded as " *".
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 21009
Patch to fix the issue

This patch adds missed property declaration into /dist.xml build file. I ported
it from TC 5.5, where this declaration is in its /build/build.xml file.

Please note, that md5 files for 6.0.14 and 6.0.13 releases should either be
corrected by hand, or just left as is as a history.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This fix was applied back on 22-Oct-2007 and is included in 6.0.16 onwards.

Many thanks for the patch.
